emailSubjectTeam: A submission from Let Us Know
emailSubjectUser: Thank you for Letting Us Know about your experience at a court or tribunal
emailTemplateTeam:
We have received this submission from a user of your court or tribunal. 

We have let them know that we have sent this email to you. If they have requested a response their email address will be in the attachment.

Thank you for continued work at this difficult time.

The Let Us Know team
emailTemplateUser:
Thank you for taking the time to contact us. 

We’ll pass your comments onto the team at the court or tribunal concerned.

Your feedback will help us make sure that the courts and tribunals are safer.

The Let Us Know team
name: Let Us Know
phaseText: This is a pilot service – your [feedback](mailto:fixmycourt@justice.gov.uk) will help us to improve it.
